drivers.description: The list of drivers, each representing the drivers who participated in races, including biographical details and statistics.

constructors.description: The list of constructors, each representing the teams or manufacturers responsible for designing and producing race cars, including statistics.

chassis.description: The list of chassis, each representing a specific race car chassis design.

engineManufacturers.description: The list of engine manufacturers, each representing the entities producing engines, including statistics.

engines.description: The list of engines, each representing the specific engines used in race cars, including configuration, performance data, and manufacturers.

tyreManufacturers.description: The list of tyre manufacturers, each representing the companies that supply tyres, including statistics.

entrants.description: The list of entrants, each representing the teams and individuals who have participated in races.

circuits.description: The list of circuits, each representing a specific racing track, including geographical location and race history.

grandsPrix.description: The list of Grands Prix, each representing a racing event, including geographical location and race history.

seasons.description: The list of seasons, each representing a complete year, with details on the entrants, races, standings, and statistics.

races.description: The list of races, each representing detailed information about individual races, including results, participants, and statistics.

continents.description: The list of continents, each representing geographical regions associated with countries.

countries.description: The list of countries, each representing a nation that is associated with drivers, constructors, etc.

id.description: The unique identifier of the driver.

name.description: The name of the driver, typically used for display purposes.

firstName.description: The given name or first name of the driver.

lastName.description: The family name or last name of the driver.

fullName.description: The full name of the driver, usually a combination of first, middle and last names.

abbreviation.description: The three-letter abbreviation for the driver, consisting of uppercase letters (e.g., 'SEN' for Ayrton Senna).

permanentNumber.description: The permanent racing number chosen by the driver.

dateOfBirth.description: The birth date of the driver.

dateOfDeath.description: The death date of the driver, if applicable.

placeOfBirth.description: The place of birth of the driver.

countryOfBirthCountryId.description: The identifier of the country where the driver was born.

nationalityCountryId.description: The identifier of the nationality of the driver.

secondNationalityCountryId.description: The identifier of the second nationality of the driver, if applicable.

familyRelationships.description: The family relationships involving the driver, such as parent or sibling relationships.

bestChampionshipPosition.description: The best finishing position achieved by the driver in a World Drivers' Championship.

bestStartingGridPosition.description: The best starting grid position achieved by the driver in a race.

bestRaceResult.description: The best finishing position achieved by the driver in a race.

totalChampionshipWins.description: The total number of World Drivers' Championship titles won by the driver.

totalRaceEntries.description: The total number of races entered by the driver.

totalRaceStarts.description: The total number of races started by the driver.

totalRaceWins.description: The total number of races won by the driver.

totalRaceLaps.description: The total number of laps completed by the driver.

totalPodiums.description: The total number of podium finishes achieved by the driver.

totalPoints.description: The total number of points accumulated by the driver.

totalChampionshipPoints.description: The total number of World Drivers' Championship points accumulated by the driver.

totalPolePositions.description: The total number of pole positions achieved by the driver.

totalFastestLaps.description: The total number of fastest laps set by the driver.

totalDriverOfTheDay.description: The total number of Driver of the Day awards received by the driver.

totalGrandSlams.description: The total number of Grand Slams achieved by the driver, defined as pole position, fastest lap, and leading every lap of the race.

positionDisplayOrder.description: The display order of the family relationship relative to other relationships of the parent driver.

driverId.description: The identifier of the related driver.

type.description: The type of the family relationship.

id.description: The unique identifier of the constructor.

name.description: The name of the constructor, typically used for display purposes.

fullName.description: The full name of the constructor.

countryId.description: The identifier of the country of origin of the constructor.

bestChampionshipPosition.description: The best finishing position achieved by the constructor in a World Constructors' Championship.

bestStartingGridPosition.description: The best starting grid position achieved by the constructor in a race.

bestRaceResult.description: The best finishing position achieved by the constructor in a race.

totalChampionshipWins.description: The total number of World Constructors' Championship titles won by the constructor.

totalRaceEntries.description: The total number of races entered by the constructor.

totalRaceStarts.description: The total number of races started by the constructor.

totalRaceWins.description: The total number of races won by the constructor.

total1And2Finishes.description: The total number of races in which the constructor finished in both 1st and 2nd place.

totalRaceLaps.description: The total number of laps completed by the constructor.

totalPodiums.description: The total number of podium finishes achieved by the constructor.

totalPodiumRaces.description: The total number of races in which the constructor finished on the podium.

totalPoints.description: The total number of points accumulated by the constructor.

totalChampionshipPoints.description: The total number of World Constructors' Championship points accumulated by the constructor.

totalPolePositions.description: The total number of pole positions achieved by the constructor.

totalFastestLaps.description: The total number of fastest laps set by the constructor.

positionDisplayOrder.description: The display order of the constructor within the chronological sequence of the parent constructor.

yearTo.description: The year to, or null if it is still active.

id.description: The unique identifier of the chassis.

constructorId.description: The identifier of the constructor associated with the chassis.

fullName.description: The full name of the chassis.

id.description: The unique identifier of the engine manufacturer.

name.description: The name of the engine manufacturer.

countryId.description: The identifier of the country of origin of the engine manufacturer.

totalRaceEntries.description: The total number of races entered by the engine manufacturer.

totalRaceStarts.description: The total number of races started by the engine manufacturer.

totalPoints.description: The total number of points accumulated by the engine manufacturer.

totalPolePositions.description: The total number of pole positions achieved by the engine manufacturer.

totalFastestLaps.description: The total number of fastest laps set by the engine manufacturer.

engineManufacturerId.description: The identifier of the engine manufacturer associated with the engine.

fullName.description: The full name of the engine.

capacity.description: The capacity of the engine, measured in liters.

configuration.description: The configuration of the engine, such as V6, V8, etc.

aspiration.description: The aspiration of the engine, such as naturally aspirated or turbocharged.

name.description: The name of the tyre manufacturer.

The unique identifier of the circuit.

name.description: The name of the circuit, typically used for display purposes.

fullName.description: The full official name of the circuit.

previousNames.description: The previous names used for the circuit.

direction.description: The direction of the current or most recently used configuration of the circuit.

placeName.description: The place name where the circuit is located.

countryId.description: The identifier of the country where the circuit is located.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate where the circuit is located.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate where the circuit is located.

length.description: The length of the current or most recently used configuration of the circuit in kilometers.

turns.description: The number of turns (corners) in the current or most recently used configuration of the circuit.

totalRacesHeld.description: The total number of races held at the circuit.
